title: Sandwich
description: A sandwich, as eaten at lunch, made with lettuce, tomato, and cheese on slices of white or wheat bread. Apple, Google, and WhatsApp add a deli meat that resembles ham.
apple_vendor_description: The sandwich emoji on Apple devices is a meticulously crafted stacked masterpiece, showcasing fresh ingredients with vibrant realism. Its layers, from the toasted bun with subtle highlights to the crisp lettuce and ripe tomato, are rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients. This delectable depiction evokes feelings of satisfaction, a quick meal, or a delicious treat, making it a universally understood symbol of culinary enjoyment within digital conversations on Apple devices.
